common.alias_password_dont_match: Don't match with key alias password field
common.nameless: This application does not have a name...

color_picker_data.recommend: We do not recommend this color because it is very clear. It can make reading difficult.

custom.color_selection: Select the color palette for your App
custom.font_selection: Select the font for your App
custom.company_logo_description: You must upload the logo of your company. This logo will be used throughout the platform.
custom.logo_input_details: We recommend you to upload PNG files with the 180x60 measurements, less than: 200kb
custom.icon_app_description: You must upload the icon of your App. This will be the icon that your users will see in the download stores and on their devices install the App.
custom.icon_input_details: We recommend you to upload PNG files with the 1024x1024 measurements, less than: 200kb
custom.header_logo_description: You must upload the logo for the header of the App. This is the logo that will be displayed in the header of your App.
custom.header_logo_details: We recommend you to upload PNG files with the 812x224 measurements, less than: 200kb
custom.logo_splash_screen_description: You must upload the image for the start of your App. This image will be displayed on the Welcome screen of your App.
custom.logo_splash_screen_details: We recommend you to upload PNG files with the 600x600 measurements, less than: 200kb
custom.title_produc: Select the plan according to your needs
custom.title_congratulation: Congratulations! your application is in verification
custom.text_congratulation: Our team is currently processing everything that corresponds to the generation of your product.
custom.title_congratulation_demo: Congratulations! your demo was successfully generated
custom.text_congratulation_demo: We have sent you an email with access to your trial app
custom.empty_prototype: You does not have any selected prototype yet
custom.icom_map_one: Select the icon of your dealer
custom.icom_map_two: Select your client's icon on the map
custom.map_suggest: We must connect your app with a provider of maps, routes and places and you must pay the costs of these services directly to the providers. We recommend Google Maps Platform or Mapbox.
custom.error_img_1: The measures of the image must be:
custom.paid_out_title: You have already paid your App
custom.finish_app_data: To send your App you must fill in the remaining necessary fields
custom.unavailable_icon_change: The change of the icons is not available in the demo.
custom.client_map_icon: This will be the icon that will represent the location of the client to whom the order will be delivered.
custom.provider_map_icon: This icon will represent the location of the provider that will deliver the order.

tabs.device_os: Your App can be developed for Android and / or iOS devices. Choose the platform on which you want your App to develop.
tabs.theme: In the selector we present the different topics that we have available for the customization of your App.
tabs.color_palette: The selected theme has a color palette which you can change as you wish. You can use one of our default palettes or customize the colors according to your preferences.
tabs.font: In the selector we present you the font options that we have available for the customization of your App. You can also select the color of the font.
tabs.icon: Select the theme of icons you want to use throughout your App. You can also select the color icons will have.
tabs.keystore: Enter the necessary data to upload your App to the corresponding store.

help.title: About key password
help.content: Generate and confirm a secure password for your keystore

help.title: About alias password
help.content: Generate and confirm a secure password for your password. This must be different from the password you chose for your keystore

help.title: About organizational unit
help.content: Name of the department of your company where you work

help.title: About organization
help.content: Name of the organization where you work

help.title: About city or locality
help.content: Name of the city where your workplace is located

help.title: About state or providence
help.content: State or providence where your place of work is located

help.title: About country
help.content: Country where your workplace is located

register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: you must fill up this form with your information
register.signin_message: If you already have an account, log in and build your App
register.success_message: Please check your inbox to verify your account
register.success_description: We sent you a email, just follow the easy instructions.
register.email_your_verify: Please check your mailbox to verify your account
register.resend_e_mail: I have not received the email
register.domain_title: Create the name of your App
register.domain_text: This name will be used for your customers to find the App. It is usually associated with the name of the company or the type of trade.
register.type_of_item_title: What kind of commerce will your App handle?
register.type_of_item_text: Select the commercial activity for which you will develop your App.

continue.needed_fields: Now we need more information about your business

joyride.themes: Select the theme for the design of your App and choose for which platform you want it to be developed (Android and / or iOS).
joyride.themes2: This selector will allow you to choose the theme that best suits the services and / or products offered by your business.
joyride.colors: This section allows you to choose the color palette that your App will use.
joyride.fonts: Choose the font you want for the texts of your App and customize its color.
joyride.icons: Select the theme of icons you want to personalize your App.
joyride.images: In this tab you must provide us with the indicated measures, the images we need to customize your App.
joyride.maps: Customize your map by selecting the icons you want to show on your App.
joyride.keystore: In this tab you must provide us with the data that is required to upload your App to the corresponding store.
